name: surfaces from horizons
desc: Provides complete control of displaying, scaling and exploding one or more geologic surfaces from a set of surfaces.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Surface Offset
properties.desc: The Surface Z Offset parameter specifies the distance that the surface will be translated in the Z axis before display.

properties.name: Minimum Thickness
properties.desc: The Minimum Thickness parameter determines the minimum spacing between surfaces when hierarchy is imposed.

properties.name: Account For Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Account for Hierarchy toggle causes geologic surfaces that might otherwise intersect each other to be corrected to account for Geologic Hierarchy.

properties.name: Reverse Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Reverse Hierarchy toggle causes hierarchy to be imposed from the bottom up versus the normal top down.

properties.name: Pass Null Through Surfaces
properties.desc: The Pass Null Through Surfaces toggle causes the Null nodes/cells defined in any surface to be passed to all of the surfaces.

properties.name: Surface Selection
properties.desc: The Surfaces Selection controls allow the user to select which surfaces are output for visualization or subsequent processing.

properties.name: Nodal Data To Map
properties.desc: The Nodal Data To Map toggles allow you to control which data components are included in the surfaces.

properties.name: Data Mapping
properties.desc: The Data Mapping control allow the user to select to which surfaces the nodal data components are mapped. For example, if Top is selected, layer thicknesses are mapped to the surface that corresponds to the top of each layer.

properties.name: Set Min Max
properties.desc: The Set Min Max control allows the user to either use the min and max of all surfaces, or to set the min and max to that of the selected surfaces.

properties.name: Cell Data To Map
properties.desc: The Cell Data To Map toggles allow you to control which cell data components are included in the surfaces.
